Helix.text:
WHAT: Vision Language Action (VLA) model 
CATEGORY: Robotics 
CAPABILITIES: Loading a dishwasher, folding laundry, rearranging packages 
FEATURES: Adaptable to different real-world challenges, can isolate and reorient objects, can handle fragile items with precision 
STAGE: Active 
NOTE: Can learn new capabilities with additional data

company.text:
NAME: Figure 
POSITIONING: Bringing general purpose learning humanoid robots into the home and global workforce 
LINKS: https://figure.ai/news/helix-loads-the-dishwasher
